casebody.data:
First Department,

August, 1980

(August 7, 1980) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Charles Harris, Appellant.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, rendered on April 3, 1978, unanimously affirmed. (See People v Thomas, 50 NY2d 467; People v Barnes, 50 NY2d 375; People v Von Werne, 41 NY2d 584). Concur—Murphy, P. J., Kupferman, Markewich and Silverman, JJ.
